channel.title: YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily
channel.description: Recent content on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily

item.title: CSBC Bihar Constable Driver Result 2025
item.description: This recruitment has been announced by RailTel Corporation of India Limited for various posts, where candidates will be selected based on interview and document verification. Interested candidates who fulfill all the required qualifications and experience can apply online. The last date to apply is August 5, 2025. This is a great opportunity for candidates aspiring to build a career in the fields of Electronics, Telecom, IT, and Networking. Before applying, all candidates are advised to carefully read the official notification to avoid any mistakes.

item.title: CBSE Group A, B & C Posts Vacancy 2026 - Exam Date
item.description: CBSE has released the Direct Recruitment 2026 notification for 124 vacancies across Group A, B and C posts including Assistant Secretary, Assistant Professor, Accounts Officer, Superintendent, Junior Translation Officer, Junior Accountant and Junior Assistant. Eligible candidates can apply online from 02 December to 22 December 2025. Selection will be based on Tier-1 and Tier-2 examinations, followed by an interview or skill test as per the post.

item.title: PM Ujjwala Yojana 2026 | New Connection & Online eKYC
RRB Ministerial & Isolated Category Vacancy 2025
item.description: RRB Ministerial & Isolated Category Recruitment 2025 has been announced through CEN No. 08/2025 for 311 vacancies in various ministerial and isolated category posts. The recruitment is conducted by Railway Recruitment Boards under the Ministry of Railways. Eligible candidates can apply online from 30/12/2025 to 29/01/2026 and selection will be based on CBT, document verification and medical examination.

item.title: Bihar Police Sub Inspector Vacancy 2025 - Admit Card
item.description: The Bihar Police Subordinate Services Commission (BPSSC) has released the Bihar Police SI Recruitment 2025 (Advt. No. 05/2025) for 1799 Sub-Inspector (SI) vacancies in the Home Department (Police Section), Government of Bihar. The pay scale for the post is Level-6 (‚Çπ35,400 ‚Äì ‚Çπ1,12,400/-). Eligible candidates must hold a graduation degree from a recognized university by 01 August 2025. The age limit is 20‚Äì37 years for UR male candidates, 20‚Äì40 years for UR female/BC/EBC, and 20‚Äì42 years for SC/ST. The selection process includes a preliminary exam, main written exam, physical efficiency test, followed by document verification and medical test. The online application process will be open from 26 September 2025 to 26 October 2025, and the application fee is ‚Çπ100/- (payable online). Interested candidates can apply through the official website bpssc.bihar.gov.in.

item.title: RSSB REET Mains Primary Teacher Level-1 Vacancy 2025- Exam Date
item.description: Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSMSSB) has released the Rajasthan Primary Teacher Recruitment 2025 notification for a total of 5636 Level-1 posts under the Primary Education Department and Sanskrit Education Department. Eligible candidates who have passed REET Level-1 can apply online from 07/11/2025 to 06/12/2025 through the official website rsmssb.rajasthan.gov.in. The recruitment includes General and Sanskrit teachers for both Non-TSP and TSP areas. Selection will be based on merit and eligibility as per REET qualification.

item.title: RSSB REET Mains Upper Primary Teacher Level-II Vacancy 2025 - Exam Date
item.description: Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSMSSB) has released the REET Mains Level-II Upper Primary School Teacher Recruitment 2025 for a total of 2123 posts under the Sanskrit Education Department. Eligible candidates can apply online from 07/11/2025 to 06/12/2025 through the official website rsmssb.rajasthan.gov.in. This recruitment includes vacancies for subjects like Sanskrit, Hindi, English, Social Science, and Maths-Science. Applicants must have a Graduation degree with B.Ed/D.El.Ed or 4-Year Integrated B.A./B.Sc. B.Ed as per NCTE norms. The application fee ranges from ‚Çπ400 to ‚Çπ600, and the exam is expected between 17/01/2026 to 21/01/2026. Interested candidates should check the official notification for eligibility, syllabus, and document requirements before applying.

item.title: Voter ID Online Apply, Correction, Status & Form List 2025
Shramodaya Admission Test 2026‚Äì27
item.description: Shramodaya Admission Test 2026‚Äì27 is conducted for admission to Shramodaya Awasiya Vidyalaya in Madhya Pradesh for Class 6, 7, 8 and 9. The admission is meant for children of registered construction workers under the MP Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board. The online application process will be available from 24/12/2025 to 20/01/2026. Selection will be based on an entrance examination, followed by merit-based admission. The exam includes subjects like Hindi, English, Mathematics, Science, Social Science and General Aptitude. Eligible students who qualify the test will get admission to Shramodaya residential schools as per district-wise seat availability.

item.title: UPSSSC Lekhpal Vacancy 2025
item.description: UPSSSC Lekhpal Recruitment 2025 offers 7994 vacancies under the Revenue Department, Uttar Pradesh. Applicants must have passed Intermediate (10+2) and qualified in UPSSSC PET 2025. The online application process will remain open from 29 December 2025 to 28 January 2026, and selection will be based on the main examination.

item.title: RPSC Exam Calendar 2026
item.description: Rajasthan Public Service Commission has published the RPSC Exam Calendar 2026 outlining the tentative examination timeline for multiple recruitment posts. The schedule includes Deputy Commandant, Lecturer, Sub Inspector, Veterinary Officer, Assistant Engineer, Senior Teacher, Junior Legal Officer, Statistical Officer and other examinations planned from January to December 2026. Some exams will be conducted through CBRT mode, while detailed admit card and exam shift information will be released separately as per RPSC guidelines.

item.title: IOCL Northern Region Apprentice Online Form 2025
item.description: IOCL Apprentice Recruitment 2025‚Äì26 for the Northern Region offers 501 state-wise apprentice vacancies for Trade, Technician, and Graduate categories. The online application process will be open from 27 December 2025 to 12 January 2026 via the NAPS/NATS portals. Eligible candidates with 12th, ITI, Diploma, or Graduation qualifications can apply for one discipline only. Selection will be merit-based, and shortlisted candidates will undergo document verification and medical examination. The apprenticeship tenure will be 12 months under Indian Oil Corporation Limited ‚Äì Marketing Division, Northern Region.

item.title: NTA NCHM JEE 2026 Admission Test
item.description: NCHM JEE 2026 is conducted by the National Testing Agency for admission to the B.Sc. Hospitality & Hotel Administration program. Candidates who have passed or are appearing in 10+2 with English can apply. Selection is based on CBT score, rank, counselling and availability of seats in affiliated hotel management institutes.

item.title: NTA UGC NET December 2025 - Admit Card
item.description: The UGC NET December 2025 Notification has been released by the National Testing Agency (NTA) for determining the eligibility of candidates for Assistant Professor and Junior Research Fellowship (JRF) in Indian universities and colleges. Candidates with a Master‚Äôs degree (55% marks for General and 50% for reserved categories) can apply online from 07 October to 07 November 2025 at ugcnet.nta.nic.in. The exam will be conducted in Computer Based Test (CBT) mode across multiple subjects.

item.title: Samagra Portal 2025
item.description: The MP Samagra ID Portal (samagra.gov.in) is an official initiative by the Department of Social Justice and Disabled Welfare, Government of Madhya Pradesh. It helps citizens register their families and members under a single database to avail benefits of various state welfare schemes. Through this portal, users can easily apply for a new Samagra ID, print Family or Member ID cards, and update personal details such as name, address, or Aadhaar information online. This digital system ensures transparency, quick access, and smooth delivery of government services to every eligible household in Madhya Pradesh.

item.title: CTET February 2026 Registration - Reopen
item.description: The CTET February 2026 notification has been released, and the online application process is open from 27/11/2025 to 18/12/2025. Candidates can apply for Paper I (Class 1‚Äì5) and Paper II (Class 6‚Äì8) based on NCTE eligibility norms. The exam will be conducted on 08 February 2026 in offline OMR mode across multiple exam centers. The application fee is ‚Çπ1000 for General/OBC (single paper) and ‚Çπ500 for SC/ST/PwD candidates. The CTET certificate is valid for a lifetime, and all important details regarding syllabus, exam pattern, eligibility, and fee structure are provided in the official notification.

item.title: Bihar BPSC AEDO Vacancy 2025 - Exam Date
item.description: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has released the official notification for 935 Assistant Education Development Officer (AEDO) vacancies under the Education Department. The online application process will begin on 27 August 2025 and continue till 26 September 2025. Candidates with a graduate degree from a recognized university are eligible to apply. The salary will be as per Level-5 pay scale (‚Çπ29,200 + allowances). Applicants must pay an examination fee of ‚Çπ100/- plus bank charges through online mode. Interested candidates should visit the official website bpsc.bihar.gov.in to apply online and check detailed guidelines.

item.title: BPSC ATP Assistant Town Planner Exam Date 2025
item.description: The Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has announced 35 vacancies for Assistant Town Planner (ATP) under Advertisement No. 89/2025 in the Urban Development & Housing Department. The online application process will be open from 28th August 2025 to 22nd September 2025 on the official BPSC website. Candidates with a Post Graduate degree in Town Planning, Regional/Urban Planning, City Planning, Country/Transport Planning, Housing, or Environmental Planning are eligible to apply. The selection will be based on a written examination and interview, and appointed candidates will receive a salary under Pay Level 09 (‚Çπ53,100 ‚Äì ‚Çπ1,67,800) along with allowances.

item.title: NCERT Non-Academic Vacancy 2025
item.description: NCERT Non-Academic Recruitment 2025 is released for 173 posts by the National Council of Educational Research and Training. The recruitment will be carried out through direct recruitment. Applications will be accepted online, and candidates can apply within 21 days from the publication date in Employment News. Selection will be based on Written Test, Skill Test or Interview as per the post.

item.title: BSF Constable (GD) Sports Quota Vacancy 2025
item.description: The BSF Constable (GD) Sports Quota Recruitment 2025 offers an opportunity to join the Border Security Force through 549 Sports Quota vacancies across India. Both male and female candidates who are 10th pass and have recognized sports achievements at national or international level can apply online between 27/12/2025 and 15/01/2026 via rectt.bsf.gov.in. The final selection will be based on sports performance marks, PST, document verification, and medical examination as per the official BSF recruitment process.

item.title: PNB Local Bank Officer LBO Vacancy 2025 - Admit Card
item.description: Punjab National Bank (PNB) has released the official notification for LBO Recruitment 2025, offering 750 Local Bank Officer (LBO) vacancies across India. Eligible graduates with at least one year of banking experience can apply online from 03/11/2025 to 23/11/2025 through the official website pnbindia.in. The selection process includes an online written test and interview, and the appointment will be made in the Junior Management Grade Scale-I. Candidates are advised to check their eligibility, fees, age limit, and local language proficiency before applying

item.title: KVS NVS Teaching & Non-Teaching Vacancy 2025 - Exam City
item.description: KVS NVS Recruitment 2025 offers more than 14967 Teaching and Non-Teaching vacancies under Kendriya Vidyalaya Sangathan and Navodaya Vidyalaya Samiti. Eligible candidates can apply online from 14/11/2025 to 04/12/2025 for posts such as PRT, TGT, PGT, Principal, Clerk, Stenographer, Librarian and others. The application fee is ‚Çπ1500 for General, OBC and EWS categories, while SC, ST, PwD and all female candidates are exempted from fees. Qualifications vary by post and include 10th, 12th, Graduation, Post Graduation, B.Ed, D.El.Ed and CTET. The selection process includes a computer-based test followed by document verification.

item.title: SSC GD Constable Vacancy 2026
item.description: The SSC GD Constable Recruitment 2026 has been announced for a total of 25,487 vacancies across various forces. The online application process will be conducted from 01/12/2025 to 31/12/2025. Candidates must have passed Class 10th (Matriculation) to be eligible. The selection process includes a Computer-Based Examination (CBT), Physical Efficiency Test (PET), Physical Standard Test (PST), and Medical Examination. The application fee is ‚Çπ100 for General/OBC/EWS, while SC/ST, Female, and Ex-Servicemen candidates are exempted from the fee. Detailed force-wise vacancies, age limit, physical standards, and exam pattern are provided in the official notification.

item.title: UP Police SI Confidential, ASI Clerk and Accounts Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment and Promotion Board (UPPRPB) has issued the official notification for Police Sub Inspector (Confidential) and Police Assistant Sub Inspector (Clerk and Accounts) posts for the year 2025. Released under Advertisement No. PRPB-B (Cl.)/2025, the recruitment includes a total of 537 vacancies. Online applications will be accepted from 20/12/2025 to 19/01/2026. Selection of candidates will be based on a written examination, followed by skill test wherever applicable, document verification and medical examination. Physical Standard Test (PST) will be conducted, and no Physical Efficiency Test (PET) is included.

item.title: UPPSC Medical Officer, Veterinary & Various Posts Online Form 2025
item.description: UPPSC Direct Recruitment 2025 has been released under Advertisement No. D-6/E-1/2025 to fill 2158 Group B Gazetted posts in various departments of Uttar Pradesh. The recruitment covers Medical Officer, Veterinary Officer, Drug Inspector and AYUSH related posts including Ayurveda, Unani and Homoeopathy. Interested and eligible applicants can apply online via the OTR based registration process from 22/12/2025 to 22/01/2026. The selection procedure will consist of a Screening Test followed by an Interview in accordance with UPPSC guidelines.

item.title: SHS Bihar ANM Vacancy 2025 Answer Key Out
item.description: Bihar SHS is inviting online applications for 5,006 ANM vacancies under HSC, RBSK, and NUHM programs. Only female candidates with a 2-year ANM diploma and BNRC registration are eligible. Applications are open from 14 to 28 August 2025, with selection based on a CBT and document verification. The monthly salary is ‚Çπ15,000.

item.title: HTET Online Form 2025
item.description: Haryana Teacher Eligibility Test HTET 2025 is organized by the Board of School Education Haryana for candidates seeking teaching eligibility in primary upper primary and secondary classes. The exam is conducted for Level 1 Level 2 and Level 3 in offline mode and the qualifying certificate remains valid for a lifetime with unlimited attempts.

item.title: RRB Exam Calendar 2026
item.description: The official RRB Exam Calendar 2026 has been issued by the Railway Recruitment Board to outline the annual recruitment planning for upcoming railway vacancies. The calendar covers key posts including Assistant Loco Pilot, Technicians, NTPC Graduate and Undergraduate posts, Junior Engineer, Paramedical staff, Ministerial and Isolated categories, Section Controller, and Level-1 Group D. It explains the quarterly schedule for vacancy assessment, OIRMS processing, indent submission, and draft CEN preparation. Candidates should note that this calendar indicates the planning cycle only, while detailed notifications and exam dates will be announced separately through individual CEN notifications.

item.title: Bank of India Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bank of India has announced the Apprentice Recruitment 2025‚Äì26 for 400 training seats across multiple states in India. Graduate candidates fulfilling the age and educational eligibility criteria can apply online from 25 December 2025 to 10 January 2026. The selection process includes an online objective examination and a qualifying local language test. The apprenticeship tenure is one year, and selected candidates will receive a stipend of ‚Çπ13,000 per month. This apprenticeship offers valuable banking experience but does not lead to permanent employment.

item.title: SSC CPO SI 2025 - Answer Key Out
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the notification for CPO SI Recruitment 2025, offering 3073 vacancies for Sub-Inspector posts in Delhi Police and CAPFs. Eligible candidates with a bachelor‚Äôs degree can apply online from 26 September to 16 October 2025. The selection process includes a Computer-Based Test (Paper-I & II), Physical Tests (PST/PET), Medical Examination, and Document Verification. This recruitment provides an excellent opportunity for graduates to join Delhi Police and CAPFs with a pay scale of Level-6 (‚Çπ35,400 ‚Äì ‚Çπ1,12,400).

item.title: MPESB Group 1 Sub Group 2 Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Madhya Pradesh Employees Selection Board (MPESB) has announced the Group 1 Subgroup 2 Combined Recruitment Test 2025 for 474 vacancies in different government departments. Applicants must possess a postgraduate qualification in the relevant discipline as specified in the departmental recruitment rules. The online application window will be active from 24 December 2025 to 07 January 2026 on esb.mp.gov.in. Selection of candidates will be based on a written examination and subsequent stages as per the official notification.

item.title: Azim Premji Foundation Scholarship 2025 ‚Äì Round 2
item.description: The Azim Premji Scholarship 2025 is a flagship initiative of the Azim Premji Foundation aimed at supporting girl students from disadvantaged backgrounds to continue their higher education. Under this program, eligible students receive ‚Çπ30,000 per year for the entire duration of their first undergraduate degree or diploma course (2‚Äì5 years) at recognized government or private colleges across India. To qualify, the applicant must have passed Class 10 and 12 as a regular student from a government school or college and secured admission in the first year of a UG or diploma course for the 2025‚Äì26 academic session. The scholarship is open to students from select states and union territories including Arunachal Pradesh, Assam, Bihar, Chhattisgarh, Jharkhand, Karnataka, Madhya Pradesh, Manipur, Meghalaya, Mizoram, Nagaland, Odisha, Puducherry, Rajasthan, Sikkim, Telangana, Tripura, Uttar Pradesh, and Uttarakhand. The application process for the Scholarship Cohort 2025 will begin on 10 September 2025, and candidates must submit documents like a passport-size photograph, Aadhaar card, and signature image. Importantly, there is no application fee, and students are advised to beware of fraud or impostors.

item.title: UPSC Exam Calendar 2026 Released
item.description: UPSC has released the official Examination and Recruitment Tests Calendar 2026 detailing the complete schedule of Civil Services, NDA, CDS, CAPF, IES/ISS, CMS, Indian Forest Service and other UPSC exams. The calendar includes important dates such as notification, application deadline and exam duration.

item.title: RPSC Protection Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: RPSC Protection Officer Recruitment 2025‚Äì26 offers an opportunity for candidates to apply for 12 Protection Officer vacancies in the Women and Child Development Department, Government of Rajasthan. The online application window will remain open between 24 December 2025 and 22 January 2026. Applicants possessing the prescribed qualification in Law or Social Work are eligible to apply. Selection of candidates will be carried out through a written test and subsequent document verification as per the official recruitment rules.

item.title: BTSC Sports Trainer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bihar Technical Service Commission (BTSC) has issued the Sports Trainer (‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§°‡§º‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ï) Recruitment 2025 notification for 48 posts. Candidates with Graduation and required sports qualification or those who have represented at state or national level in sports are eligible to apply. The online application window will remain open from 22/12/2025 to 22/01/2026. Selection will be carried out through a Computer Based Test (CBT) as per BTSC recruitment rules. This is a valuable opportunity for candidates looking for sports-related government jobs in Bihar.

item.title: RRB Section Controller Vacancy 2025- Exam Date
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has announced 368 vacancies for Section Controller posts through CEN 04/2025. The online application process will be open from 15 September to 14 October 2025. Candidates with a graduation degree and age between 20 to 33 years can apply. Selection will be based on a Computer-Based Test, skill test (if required), document verification, and medical examination. The post offers a Level 6 pay scale with attractive allowances.

item.title: RRB Group D / Level 1 Vacancy 2026
item.description: Railway Recruitment Boards have released the indicative notice for Level-1 / Group D Recruitment under CEN 09/2025 to fill around 22000 vacancies across various RRB regions. These posts fall under Level-1 of the 7th Pay Commission with a starting pay of ‚Çπ18000 per month along with allowances. The online application process will begin on 21 January 2026 and will remain open till 20 February 2026 on the official RRB application portal. Candidates between 18 and 33 years of age as on 01 January 2026 who meet the prescribed educational qualifications will be eligible to apply. Complete details regarding post-wise eligibility selection process syllabus and medical standards will be available in the detailed notification published by the respective RRBs.

item.title: SBI Bank Specialist Officer SO Vacancy 2025
item.description: State Bank of India has released the Wealth Management Specialist Cadre Officer recruitment for VP Wealth (SRM), AVP Wealth (RM) and Customer Relationship Executive (CRE) posts. Online applications are open from 02 to 23 December 2025. Selection will be based on shortlisting and interview. Eligible candidates with the required qualification, experience and age criteria can apply online.

item.title: UP Home Guard Vacancy 2025 - Exam Date
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Home Guard Recruitment 2025 has announced 41,424 vacancies for Home Guard (Male/Female) posts across all districts of the state. The online application process will run from 18 November 2025 to 17 December 2025. Candidates must have passed Class 10 (High School) from a recognized board and must be between 18 to 30 years of age as on 01 July 2025. The selection process includes Physical Standards Test (PST) and Physical Efficiency Test (PET), where male candidates must complete 4.8 km in 28 minutes and female candidates must complete 2.4 km in 16 minutes. The application fee is ‚Çπ400 for General/OBC/EWS and ‚Çπ300 for SC/ST candidates. The complete district-wise vacancy list and PET/PST rules are provided in the official notification.

item.title: IBPS RRBs CRP XIV Office Assistant Scale-I Mains/ Scale II, III Admit Card 2025
item.description: IBPS has announced the CRP RRBs XIV Recruitment 2025-26 with 13217 vacancies for Office Assistants and Officers (Scale I, II & III) in Regional Rural Banks. Online applications are open from 1st to 21st September 2025 at ibps.in

item.title: RSSB Ayush Officer Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB), Jaipur has issued Advertisement No. 06/2025 for the recruitment of 1535 Contractual Ayush Officers (Ayurved, Homoeopathy, Unani) under the National Health Mission (NHM), Rajasthan. Eligible candidates can apply online through the SSO Rajasthan Portal from 10 October 2025 to 08 November 2025. The recruitment will be on a one-year contract basis, extendable as per the project duration.

item.title: RSSB Jamadar Grade-II Admit Card 2025
item.description: Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSMSSB) has released the official notification for Jamadar Grade-II Recruitment 2025 under the Public Works Department (PWD). A total of 72 posts are available ‚Äî 64 for Non-Scheduled Area and 8 for Scheduled Area. Eligible candidates who have passed Senior Secondary (12th) and possess a valid computer qualification (like RSCIT, DOEACC ‚ÄúO‚Äù Level, COPA, or Diploma in Computer Science) can apply online. The online application process will be active from 17/10/2025 to 15/11/2025, and the OMR-based exam will be conducted on 27/12/2025.

item.title: PAN Card - New PAN, Correction, e-PAN Download & Status Check
item.description: PAN Card is a permanent identification number issued by the Income Tax Department of India for tax and financial transactions. This page provides complete information about PAN Card including online application, correction, verification, Aadhaar linking, e-PAN, required documents, uses for job and business, and important rules in a simple and clear format.

item.title: New Pan Card, Correction / Update Old Pan, Download 49A pdf Form
UP Police Computer Operator Grade-A Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment and Promotion Board (UPPRPB) has released the Police Computer Operator Grade-A Recruitment 2025 notification to fill 1352 posts. This recruitment is open to Intermediate pass candidates with a valid computer qualification certificate. The online application process will remain active from 16 December 2025 to 15 January 2026. The selection process includes a written examination followed by document verification, strictly as per the official notification.

item.title: UPPSC Polytechnic Lecturer Vacancy 2025
item.description: UPPSC has invited online applications for 513 posts under the Technical Education (Teaching) Service 2025. The recruitment includes Polytechnic Lecturers, Architecture faculty and Workshop Superintendent. Candidates with First Class Engineering degrees or First Class Master‚Äôs degrees in relevant subjects can apply. The online form is open from 02 December 2025 to 02 January 2026.

item.title: MP Police ASI & Subedar Stenographer Answer Key 2025
item.description: The Madhya Pradesh Police Headquarters has announced 500 vacancies for Subedar (Stenographer) and Assistant Sub Inspector (Clerk) posts under direct and departmental recruitment. Eligible candidates with 12th pass and computer proficiency (CPCT/Hindi Typing) can apply online via MPESB from 03 October to 17 October 2025. The written exam will start on 10 December 2025. Reservation benefits and age relaxation are applicable only for MP domicile candidates.

item.title: IOCL Non-Executive Personnel Vacancy 2025
item.description: Indian Oil Corporation Limited has released the IOCL Non-Executive Recruitment 2025 notification for filling multiple non-executive positions in its refinery units across India. The recruitment is open to Diploma and B.Sc qualified candidates for posts including Junior Engineering Assistant, Junior Technical Assistant and Junior Quality Control Analyst. The selection will be carried out through a Computer Based Test followed by a qualifying Skill/Proficiency/Physical Test. Interested candidates can apply online between 20 December 2025 and 09 January 2026. The offered pay scale ranges from ‚Çπ25,000 to ‚Çπ1,05,000 with standard PSU allowances.

item.title: MPPSC SET Exam 2025
item.description: The Madhya Pradesh State Eligibility Test (MP SET 2025) is conducted by the Madhya Pradesh Public Service Commission (MPPSC) to determine the eligibility of candidates for the post of Assistant Professor in universities and colleges of Madhya Pradesh. Applications will be accepted online from 25/10/2025 to 20/11/2025, and the exam will be held on 11/01/2026.

item.title: CCRH Research Officer & Other Posts Answer key 2025
item.description: The Central Council for Research in Homoeopathy (CCRH), under the Ministry of AYUSH, Government of India, has released the CCRH Recruitment 2025 Notification (Advt. No. 179/2025-26) for 48 vacancies across Group A, B and C posts. Eligible candidates can apply online from 05 November 2025 to 26 November 2025 through the official websites - ccrhindia.ayush.gov.in, ccrhonline.in or eapplynow.com. The recruitment includes posts like Research Officer, Junior Librarian, Pharmacist, X-Ray Technician, LDC, and Driver. Selection will be based on a Computer-Based Test (CBT) and an interview (for Group-A). Interested applicants should read the full notification for eligibility, qualification, age limit, and application fee details before applying.

item.title: CCRH Staff Nurse, MLT, Stenographer & ARO Answer Key 2025
item.description: Central Council for Research in Homoeopathy (CCRH) has released the official notification Advt. No. 180/2025-26 for 42 Group B & C vacancies including Staff Nurse, Medical Laboratory Technologist, Junior Stenographer, Junior MLT, and Assistant Research Officer (Pharmacognosy). The online application process will be open from 05/11/2025 to 26/11/2025. Candidates must apply through the official website www.ccrhindia.nic.in. The application fee is ‚Çπ500 for UR/OBC/EWS, while SC/ST/PwD/Female candidates are exempted. Selection will be based on a Computer Based Test (CBT) followed by document verification.

item.title: MPPKVVCL Line Attendant Vacancy 2025
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Paschim Kshetra Vidyut Vitaran Company Limited (MPWZ / MPPKVVCL) has released a notification for 4009 vacancies including AE, JE, Line Attendant, Test Assistant, Stenographer and various other posts. The online application will start from 20 December 2025 and the last date to apply is 21 January 2026. Candidates from all states can apply. Selection will be based on a written exam and document verification. Salary ranges from ‚Çπ18,000 to ‚Çπ42,700 per month.

item.title: BOI Credit Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bank of India has announced Credit Officer Recruitment 2025 for 514 posts under GBO Stream. The recruitment includes MMGS-II, MMGS-III and SMGS-IV scales. Selection will be through online exam and interview.

item.title: SSC Jr Engineer Answer Key 2025
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the notification for the Junior Engineer (JE) Recruitment 2025. The vacancies are available in various departments such as BRO, CPWD, CWC, MES, NTRO, and others for trades including Civil, Electrical, and Mechanical. Candidates must have a Diploma or Degree in the relevant engineering discipline. Some departments also require two years of work experience. The application process is completely online, and the selection will be based on a Computer-Based Test (Paper 1), Paper 2, and Document Verification. This recruitment is open to both male and female candidates across India. Interested applicants can visit the official SSC website https://ssc.gov.in for more details and to apply online.

item.title: RSSB Village Development Officer VDO Result 2025
SSC CGL Tier - II Exam Date Out
SBI Probationary Officers PO Final Result 2025 Out
item.description: The State Bank of India (SBI) has released the notification for the recruitment of 541 Probationary Officer (PO) posts, including 500 regular posts and 41 backlog posts. Candidates must have a Bachelor‚Äôs degree in any stream from a recognized university in India to be eligible. The category-wise distribution of vacancies is as follows: UR ‚Äì 203, OBC ‚Äì 135, EWS ‚Äì 50, SC ‚Äì 80, and ST ‚Äì 73. The application process will be conducted online through the official SBI website at sbi.co.in. This is a golden opportunity for graduates seeking a prestigious career in banking with SBI.

item.title: BRLPS JEEViKA Answer Key 2025
item.description: Bihar Rural Livelihoods Promotion Society (BRLPS), under the Rural Development Department of the Government of Bihar, has released the official notification for JEEViKA Recruitment 2025. A total of 2747 vacancies have been announced across various posts including Block Project Manager, Livelihood Specialist, Area Coordinator, Accountant, Office Assistant, Community Coordinator, and Block IT Executive. The required educational qualifications vary by post, ranging from Intermediate (for female Community Coordinators) to Graduation, Post-Graduation, Diploma, or B.Tech. The minimum age for applicants is 18 years, while the upper age limit goes up to 42 years depending on the category. The selection process involves a Computer-Based Test (CBT) and a typing test for relevant positions. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official website https://brlps.in from 30th July to 18th August 2025. This is a great opportunity to contribute to Bihar‚Äôs largest rural development mission and support the empowerment of rural communities.

item.title: Bihar Vidhan Parishad Admit Card 2025
item.description: Bihar Vidhan Parishad Secretariat has released the official notification for 24 vacancies including 09 Driver and 15 Office Attendant posts. Eligible candidates with a minimum qualification of Matric (10th Pass) can apply online from 29/09/2025 to 20/10/2025. Selection will be based on a written exam, while Driver posts also require a driving skill test. Interested applicants are advised to read the official notification for detailed eligibility, age limit, and application process.

item.title: BSF Head Constable (RO/RM) PET / PST Admit Card 2025
item.description: BSF is inviting online applications for 1121 Head Constable (RO & RM) posts under the BSF Head Constable Recruitment 2025. The application process will run from 24 August to 23 September 2025. Candidates with 12th PCM (60% marks) or 10th + ITI in relevant trades can apply. The selection process includes a written test, physical standards test, and medical examination. This is a great opportunity to join the Border Security Force in technical roles.

item.title: EMRS Teaching & Non-Teaching Admit Card 2025
item.description: The National Education Society for Tribal Students (NESTS) has announced the EMRS Recruitment 2025 (ESSE-2025) notification for a total of 7267 vacancies across teaching and non-teaching posts. The vacancies include Principal, PGT, TGT, Female Staff Nurse, Hostel Warden, Accountant, Junior Secretariat Assistant (JSA), and Lab Attendant. Candidates can apply online until 23rd October 2025, with application fees ranging from ‚Çπ500 to ‚Çπ2500 depending on the post and category. The eligibility criteria vary by position, requiring qualifications from 10th/12th to Graduate, Postgraduate, B.Ed., CTET, or professional degrees. The age limit is set between 30 to 50 years, with applicable relaxations for reserved categories. This recruitment provides a major opportunity for aspirants seeking teaching and non-teaching jobs in Eklavya Model Residential Schools (EMRS) across India.

item.title: MPPSC Food Safety Officer Answer Key 2025
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Public Service Commission (MPPSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of Food Safety Officer (FSO) with a total of 67 vacancies. The application process will be conducted online, and the job location is Madhya Pradesh. Candidates from all over India are eligible to apply, but those from other states will be treated as General (UR) category and will not receive any reservation or fee relaxation. Applicants must hold a Bachelor’s, Master’s, or Ph.D. degree in Food Technology, Agriculture, Biotechnology, Chemistry, Veterinary Science, Medicine, or a related field, or possess an equivalent qualification recognized by the Central Government. The age limit is 21 to 40 years, with age relaxation applicable as per rules for reserved categories. For complete details and to apply, visit the official website mppsc.mp.gov.in.

item.title: UP Police Assistant Operator Online Form 2025
item.description: UP Police has released the Assistant Operator Recruitment 2025 for 44 posts under the Police Radio Cadre. Eligible 12th PCM passed candidates aged 18‚Äì22 years can apply online from 03/12/2025 to 02/01/2026. The selection includes a written exam, PST, PET and document verification. Application fee is ‚Çπ500 for General/OBC/EWS and ‚Çπ400 for SC/ST.

item.title: MPESB MP Police Constable Answer Key 2025
item.description: The Madhya Pradesh Professional Examination Board (MPESB) has announced the MP Police Constable Recruitment 2025 for a total of 7500 Constable (General Duty ‚Äì SAF & DEF) posts. The online application process will start from 15/09/2025 and remain open till 29/09/2025, while the correction window will be available up to 04/10/2025. The written examination is scheduled to begin from 30/10/2025. Candidates applying for this recruitment must have passed 10th/12th (for UR/SC/OBC/EWS) or at least 8th standard (for ST candidates) from a recognized board. The minimum age limit is 18 years and the maximum is 33 years for general category male candidates, with age relaxations applicable for reserved categories and women as per rules. The application fee is ‚Çπ500 for UR, ‚Çπ250 for SC/ST/OBC/EWS (MP domicile), while departmental candidates need to pay ‚Çπ200 (UR) or ‚Çπ100 (reserved categories) along with applicable portal charges. This recruitment offers a great opportunity for candidates seeking a stable government job in the Madhya Pradesh Police Department.

item.title: IB Security Assistant/Executive Result 2025
item.description: The Intelligence Bureau (IB), under the Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA), has released a notification for the recruitment of Security Assistant/Executive posts for the year 2025. A total of 4987 vacancies are available across various states and Union Territories. Candidates must have passed 10th standard, possess knowledge of the local language/dialect, and hold a domicile certificate of the region applied for. The post offers a Level-3 pay scale (‚Çπ21,700 ‚Äì ‚Çπ69,100) along with special allowances. This is a central government Group ‘C’ non-gazetted, non-ministerial post, offering job security and growth in the intelligence sector. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official portal before the last date.

item.title: MPPSC Exam Calendar 2026 Released

Candidates preparing for MP government jobs and entrance examinations can use this calendar to plan their preparation in advance, while final dates will be confirmed through official notifications issued by MPESB.

item.title: Aadhaar Card Download by Face Authentication / Online Correction
item.description: Aadhaar Card is a 12-digit unique identification number issued by UIDAI to every Indian resident. It serves as both identity and address proof for various government and private services. Now, you can easily download your Aadhaar using Face Authentication, even without a linked mobile number or OTP. Learn the complete process for downloading, updating, and correcting Aadhaar details, along with the list of required documents and official UIDAI links ‚Äî all in one place.

item.title: FSSAI Food License Registration Online Form
item.description: The FSSAI Food License is mandatory for all food-related businesses in India to ensure food safety and compliance with the Food Safety and Standards Act, 2006. It is issued by the Food Safety and Standards Authority of India (FSSAI) under the Ministry of Health & Family Welfare. There are three types of licenses ‚Äì Basic, State, and Central ‚Äì depending on the business size and turnover. Applicants must submit documents like identity proof, address proof, and business registration while applying online through the FSSAI portal. The license is valid for 1 to 5 years, and renewal is required before expiry. Running a food business without a license may lead to heavy penalties or legal action.

Candidates with 12th Pass, ITI, Diploma, or Graduation qualifications can apply for various posts such as Technician Apprentice, Trade Apprentice (HR/Accountant), and Data Entry Operator. The selection will be purely merit-based on educational marks, followed by document verification and medical examination. There is no application fee for this recruitment.

ISRO Assistant Rajbhasha Vacancy 2025
item.description: ISRO has invited online applications for Assistant (Rajbhasha) posts through Advertisement No. SAC:02:2025. A total of 07 vacancies are available across ISRO Centres and IIST. Candidates must have a Graduation degree with 60% marks, along with Hindi typing speed of 25 w.p.m. and computer proficiency. The age limit is 18 to 28 years as on 02 October 2025. The online application process is open from 12 September 2025 to 02 October 2025. All candidates must pay ‚Çπ500 as the application fee, which will be refunded fully or partially depending on category. Selection will be done through a Written Test and Skill Test.

item.title: DSSSB Assistant Teacher (Primary) Vacancy 2025
item.description: Delhi Subordinate Services Selection Board (DSSSB) has released Notification No. 05/2025 for 1180 Assistant Teacher (Primary) posts. Eligible candidates can apply online from 17th September to 16th October 2025. Selection will be done through a computer-based examination.

item.title: Join Indian Coast Guard Navik/Yantrik CGEPT 2026 Admit Card Out
ECIL Technical Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Electronics Corporation of India Limited (ECIL) has invited applications for 160 Technical Officer posts on contract basis through Advt. No. 17/2025. The contract is initially for 9 months and extendable up to 4 years based on project needs. Candidates with BE/B.Tech. in ECE, EEE, CSE, IT, Mechanical and related disciplines with minimum 1-year post-qualification experience are eligible. The salary ranges from ‚Çπ25,000 to ‚Çπ31,000 per month along with PF, TA/DA, paid leave and medical benefits. The selection will be done on the basis of academic marks, work experience and personal interview (no written exam). The online application window will remain open from 16th September to 22nd September 2025 at www.ecil.co.in

item.title: UPPSC APO Recruitment 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission (UPPSC) has released the official notification for Assistant Prosecution Officer (APO) Recruitment 2025 with 182 vacancies. Eligible candidates with a Law degree (LLB) can apply online from 16 September 2025 to 16 October 2025 through the UPPSC portal. The selection process includes Prelims, Mains, and Interview, followed by document verification and medical examination. Applicants must be between 21 to 40 years of age as on 1 July 2025. The pay scale ranges from Rs. 47,600 to Rs. 1,51,100, offering a great career opportunity for law graduates in Uttar Pradesh.

item.title: NFR Sports Quota Recruitment 2025
item.description: The Northeast Frontier Railway (NFR) has released the notification for Sports Quota Recruitment 2025-26 with a total of 56 vacancies across Level 1 to Level 5 posts. Eligible Indian sportspersons can apply online from 16 September 2025 to 15 October 2025. The recruitment is open in various sports disciplines including athletics, boxing, cricket, football, volleyball, weightlifting, basketball, archery, and more. Candidates will be selected based on their sports performance and trials, as no written exam will be conducted. The application fee is ‚Çπ500 for General candidates and ‚Çπ250 for SC/ST/Women/Minority/EBC, with partial refund available after appearing in trials.

item.title: MPESB Candidate Profiling / Profile Panjiyan Form Online
item.description: To apply for any government recruitment under the Madhya Pradesh Employees Selection Board (MPESB), all candidates must complete the Candidate Profile Registration process. This is a one-time mandatory step where applicants register using Aadhaar eKYC, upload personal and academic details, and receive a unique Profile ID. This ID is required for all future MPESB applications. The process is simple, online, and essential for anyone seeking government jobs in Madhya Pradesh.

item.title: SBI Manager (Credit Analyst) Vacancy Online Form 2025
item.description: The State Bank of India (SBI) has released the SCO Recruitment 2025 notification for 63 Manager (Credit Analyst) posts in MMGS-III. Eligible candidates with MBA (Finance)/CA/CFA/ICWA and minimum 3 years‚Äô corporate credit experience can apply online from 11th September to 2nd October 2025. Selection will be through shortlisting and interview, with postings anywhere in India.

item.title: Army AFMS Medical Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Indian Army Armed Forces Medical Services (AFMS) has announced 225 vacancies for Short Service Commission (SSC) Medical Officers in 2025. Eligible MBBS/PG candidates can apply online at join.afms.gov.in between 13 September and 3 October 2025. Selection will be based on NEET PG scores, interview, and medical tests.

item.title: RRC SR Sports Quota Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Cell (Southern Railway) has released the Sports Quota Recruitment 2025 for Level 1 to 5 posts, with a total of 67 vacancies. Candidates with educational qualifications ranging from 10th Pass/ITI to Graduate are eligible to apply depending on the post. The age limit for applicants is 18‚Äì25 years as of 1 January 2026, with age relaxation as per government rules. The application fee is Rs 500 for General/OBC/EWS and Rs 250 for SC/ST/PWD/ESM/Female candidates, which is refundable. Interested candidates must apply online through the official website rrcmas.in. The application process starts on 13 September 2025 and closes on 12 October 2025, while the trials date will be notified later.

item.title: BPSC Lower Division Clerk LDC Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of Lower Division Clerk (LDC) posts with a total of 26 vacancies. Candidates who have passed Intermediate (10+2) in any stream from a recognized board and possess computer operation and typing skills are eligible to apply. This recruitment is primarily for domicile candidates of Bihar, who will receive reservation benefits as per their category. Candidates from other states can also apply but will be considered under the General (Unreserved) category only, without any reservation or age relaxation. The application process is completely online. Out of the total posts, 13 are for General, 3 for EWS, 4 for SC, 1 for ST, 2 for EBC, 2 for BC, and 1 for BC Female.

item.title: SBI Manager & Deputy Manager Vacancy 2025
item.description: The State Bank of India (SBI) has announced the SBI SCO Recruitment 2025 for a total of 59 Specialist Cadre Officer vacancies on a regular basis, including the posts of Manager (MMGS-III) and Deputy Manager (MMGS-II) in the Digital Platforms domain. Candidates must hold a B.E./B.Tech. in IT, Computer Science, Electronics, Electrical, or related fields, or an MCA with at least 60% marks, while an MBA is preferred. Relevant work experience of 5 years for Manager and 3 years for Deputy Manager in Digital Payments, FinTech, CRM, or related fields is mandatory. The age limit is 28‚Äì35 years for Manager and 25‚Äì32 years for Deputy Manager (as on 31.08.2025). The application fee is ‚Çπ750 for General, OBC, and EWS candidates, while SC, ST, and PwBD candidates are exempted. The selection process will be based on shortlisting and interview. Eligible candidates can apply online from 11th September to 2nd October 2025 through the official SBI Careers website.

item.title: IOCL NR Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Indian Oil Corporation Limited (IOCL), Marketing Division ‚Äì Northern Region, has announced 523 Apprentice vacancies for 2025. The application window is open from 12 September to 11 October 2025. Eligible candidates with ITI, Diploma, or Graduation qualifications can apply online. Selection will be based on merit, document verification, and medical examination, with no application fee for any category.

item.title: BOM Specialist Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bank of Maharashtra has announced Specialist Officer Recruitment 2025 (Phase II) for Scale II to VI posts in IT, Credit, Legal, Risk, Treasury, and other departments. Online applications are open from 10th to 30th September 2025.

item.title: RRC ER Sports Quota Vacancy 2025
item.description: RRC Eastern Railway has announced 50 vacancies under Sports Quota Recruitment 2025-26 for Group C and D posts. Eligible sportspersons can apply online from 10th September to 9th October 2025, and selection will be through field trials and document verification.

item.title: Promotion or Ads on Whatsapp Channel Terms
item.description:
Terms & Conditions for WhatsApp Promotion

1. Single Posting Rule:

We will post your content only once. If the post/link is correct, functional, and free from errors, it will neither be modified nor reposted again.

2. Posting Duration:

The post/link you provide will be shared on our channel for a fixed duration of 24-48 hours only.

3. Right to Update New Posts:

30 minutes after your post or link is shared, we reserve the right to update new posts on our channel.

item.title: RRC SR Scouts & Guides Quota Vacancy 2025
item.description: Southern Railway and Integral Coach Factory (ICF) invite applications from Indian citizens who are active members of Bharat Scouts & Guides for recruitment to Level-1 posts under the Scouts & Guides Quota for the year 2025-26. A total of 14 posts are available‚Äî12 in Southern Railway (2 posts each in Chennai, Tiruchchirappalli, Madurai, Palakkad, Thiruvananthapuram, and Salem) and 2 in ICF. Candidates must have a minimum educational qualification of 10th pass, ITI, or National Apprenticeship Certificate (NAC) from NCVT. The age limit varies by category: UR 18‚Äì33 years, OBC 18‚Äì36 years, and SC/ST 18‚Äì38 years as on 01-01-2026. The selection process includes a Written Test / Computer Based Test (CBT). The application fee is Rs. 500 for general candidates and Rs. 250 for reserved categories, refundable after appearing in the exam. These posts are open to all communities, and eligible candidates can apply online from 30.08.2025 to 29.09.2025.

item.title: BPSC Assistant Public Sanitation & Waste Management Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) invites online applications for 54 posts of Assistant Public Sanitation & Waste Management Officer under the Department of Urban Development & Housing, Bihar. Candidates from all states of India, both male and female, are eligible. Required qualifications include a Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Chemistry/Environmental Science, B.E./B.Tech in Chemical/Civil/Environmental Science/Public Health Engineering/Biotechnology, or a degree in Planning/Architecture. Age limit (as of 01.08.2025) is 21‚Äì37 years for unreserved males, 21‚Äì40 years for unreserved females/OBC/EBC, and 21‚Äì42 years for SC/ST. Application fee is ‚Çπ100 (plus ‚Çπ200 biometric fee if Aadhaar is not provided). Apply online between 05.09.2025 and 30.09.2025 at www.bpsc.bihar.gov.in

item.title: Reliance Foundation Scholarships 2025-26
item.description: Reliance Foundation Scholarships 2025‚Äì26 support talented Indian students pursuing Undergraduate (UG) and Postgraduate (PG) programs. Scholarships provide financial aid up to ‚Çπ2,00,000 for UG and ‚Çπ6,00,000 for PG students, along with mentorship, networking, workshops, internships, and volunteering opportunities. Eligible students must be first-year learners in full-time regular courses, meet academic criteria, and complete a mandatory online aptitude test. Last date to apply: 4th October 2025 via the official Reliance Foundation Scholarships portal.

item.title: NPCT DBT 2025: Benefits, Purpose, and Complete Guide
item.description: NPCT DBT (National Payments Corporation of India ‚Äì Direct Benefit Transfer) enables the Indian government to transfer subsidies, pensions, scholarships, and other benefits directly to beneficiaries‚Äô bank accounts. It ensures fast, secure, and transparent payments by linking beneficiaries‚Äô Aadhaar numbers with their bank accounts. Payments can be tracked via bank statements, the DBT Bharat Portal, or the UMANG app. This system covers various schemes such as LPG subsidies, MGNREGA wages, farmer support, pensions, and student scholarships.

item.title: SCI Assistant Manager & Executive Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Shipping Corporation of India Ltd. (SCI) has invited applications for 75 vacancies of Assistant Manager (E2) and Executive (E0). The online application process will run from 06 September 2025 to 27 September 2025. Maximum age limit is 27 years (with relaxations as per Govt. norms). The selection process includes Online Test, Group Discussion, and Personal Interview. Application fee is ‚Çπ500 for UR/OBC-NCL/EWS and ‚Çπ100 for SC/ST/PwBD/ESM. Interested candidates can apply online through the official website shipindia.com

item.title: Indian Oil Engineers/Officers Vacancy 2025
item.description: Indian Oil Corporation Limited (IOCL) has announced recruitment for Engineers/Officers (Grade A) in Chemical, Electrical, and Instrumentation disciplines through CBT 2025. Eligible candidates with B.Tech./B.E. degrees can apply online from 05/09/2025 to 21/09/2025, admit card will be available from 17/10/2025, and the CBT will be held on 31/10/2025.

item.description: The Union Public Service Commission (UPSC) has released the Special Advertisement No. 52/2025 for direct recruitment to a total of 230 vacancies in the Employees‚Äô Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) under the Ministry of Labour and Employment. These include 156 posts of Enforcement Officer/Accounts Officer (EO/AO) and 74 posts of Assistant Provident Fund Commissioner (APFC). Candidates must hold a Bachelor‚Äôs Degree from a recognized university. For the APFC post, qualifications such as a degree in Law, MBA, CA, or equivalent are desirable. The online application process will begin on July 29, 2025, and close on August 18, 2025. Selection will be based on a written examination, and postings will be across India. Interested candidates can apply online at https://upsconline.nic.in.

item.title: RPSC 1st Grade Teacher Agriculture Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) has announced the RPSC 1st Grade Teacher (Agriculture) Recruitment 2025 for a total of 500 posts of School Lecturer in the Secondary Education Department. Candidates must have a 4-year Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Agriculture or Horticulture, a Postgraduate degree in the relevant subject, and a B.Ed. from an NCTE-recognized institution, along with knowledge of Hindi in Devanagari script and Rajasthani culture. The online application process will be open from 4th September to 3rd October 2025, with the written examination expected between 31st May and 16th June 2026. The selection process will be based on a written test, document verification, and medical examination, and the post carries a salary under Pay Matrix Level L-12 with Grade Pay ‚Çπ4800.

item.title: Rajasthan Sub Inspector Vacancy 2025 Apply Online
item.description: Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) has released the official notification for Rajasthan Police SI and Platoon Commander Recruitment 2025-26 under advertisement number 05/Exam/SI-PC/RPSC/EP-I/2025-26. The online application process will begin on 10 August 2025 and the last date to apply is 08 September 2025. Applicants from all states of India can apply for general posts, while certain reserved posts are limited to Rajasthan domicile candidates only.

item.description: LIC Housing Finance Limited (LIC HFL) has announced 192 Apprentice vacancies for graduates under a 12-month apprenticeship program. Eligible candidates can apply online from 02 September to 22 September 2025. Selection will be done through interviews in October‚ÄìNovember 2025.

item.title: ECIL ITI Trade Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: ECIL ITI Trade Apprentice Recruitment 2025: Electronics Corporation of India Limited (ECIL), Hyderabad has announced 412 Apprentice vacancies in various ITI trades. Eligible candidates from all over India, including females, can apply online from 01/09/2025 to 22/09/2025. Selection will be based on ITI merit and document verification, and training will begin on 01/11/2025 at ECIL Hyderabad, Telangana.

item.title: Bihar SHS Lab Technician Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The State Health Society, Bihar invites online applications for 1075 posts of Laboratory Technicians, including 1068 Lab Technician and 7 Senior Lab Technician (NTEP) vacancies. Candidates must have 10+2 (Physics, Chemistry, Biology) with DMLT/BMLT or relevant M.Sc./B.Sc. qualifications for senior posts. The selection will be based on a Computer-Based Test (CBT) followed by document verification. Application fees range from ‚Çπ125 to ‚Çπ500 depending on category. Salary offered is ‚Çπ15,000 for Lab Technician and ‚Çπ24,000 for Senior Lab Technician.

item.title: Naval Dockyard Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Naval Dockyard, Mumbai has released a notification for 286 Apprentice vacancies in various ITI and Non-ITI trades under the Apprentices Act 1961. Both male and female candidates from all states can apply online between 25th August 2025 and 12th September 2025 at https://applicationportal.in/ No application fee is required.

item.title: RRC WCR Apprentice Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Cell (RRC), West Central Railway has announced 2,865 Apprentice vacancies under Notification No. 01/2025. The online application process will run from 30th August to 29th September 2025. Candidates must have passed 10th Class with at least 50% marks along with an ITI certificate (NCVT/SCVT) in the relevant trade. The age limit is 15 to 24 years with relaxation as per rules. Selection will be purely based on merit (10th + ITI marks). Application fee is ‚Çπ141 for UR/OBC/EWS and ‚Çπ41 for SC/ST/PwBD/Women. Interested candidates can apply online through the official website wcr.indianrailways.gov.in.

item.title: RCFL Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Rashtriya Chemicals and Fertilizers Limited (RCFL) has announced 325 Apprentice vacancies for Graduate, Technician, and Trade categories. Eligible candidates with Graduation, Diploma, or 12th qualification can apply online till 12th September 2025. Selection will be done on a merit basis (marks in qualifying exam), with no written test.

item.title: BPSC AES Assistant Environmental Scientist Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has invited applications for 17 Assistant Environmental Scientist (AES) posts under the Department of Environment, Forest & Climate Change. Eligible candidates with a B.Sc./M.Sc. degree in Environmental Science, Chemistry, Physics, or Life Sciences can apply online from 27 August to 19 September 2025 at bpsc.bihar.gov.in. Selection will be through a written exam and interview.

item.title: AAI Junior Executive JE Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The application process for the recruitment will begin on 28 August 2025 and remain open until 27 September 2025. Interested and eligible candidates are advised to complete their registration within the given dates to avoid last-minute issues. Applicants should carefully read the official notification, check the eligibility criteria, and prepare the required documents before applying.

item.title: BOB Local Bank Officers LBO Admit Card 2025
item.description: Bank of Baroda (BOB) has announced 2500 vacancies for the post of Local Bank Officer (JMG/S-I) across multiple states. Candidates must hold a graduation degree in any discipline from a recognized university. Professional qualifications like CA, Engineering, or Medical are also accepted. Applicants must have at least 1 year of experience as an officer in a Scheduled Commercial Bank or Regional Rural Bank listed under the Second Schedule of the RBI. Experience in NBFCs, cooperative banks, and fintechs will not be considered. The recruitment is open state-wise with preference for candidates familiar with the local language.

item.title: RPSC Junior Legal Officer (JLO) Vacancy 2025
item.description: RPSC has announced 12 vacancies for the post of Junior Legal Officer (JLO) in the Jaipur Development Authority (JDA) through notification number 11/Exam/JLO/JDA/EP-I/2025-26. Interested and eligible Law graduates can apply online between 27 August 2025 to 25 September 2025. The recruitment process includes a written examination and document verification. Candidates must carefully read the notification for eligibility, application fees, and reservation details before applying.

item.title: Oil India Limited Vacancy 2025
item.description: Oil India Limited, a Maharatna PSU, has released its Recruitment Notification 2025 for a total of 102 vacancies in Grade A, B, and C posts. The vacancies include positions such as Superintending Engineer, Senior Officers in various disciplines (Chemical, Civil, Electrical, Mechanical, IT, Petroleum, HR, Legal, Finance, Public Affairs, Geology, Geophysics, Electronics & Communication, Fire & Safety, HSE, Security, Company Secretary), along with Confidential Secretary and Hindi Officer. Both male and female candidates are eligible to apply. The application process is completely online, starting from 26 August 2025 and closing on 26 September 2025. Candidates will be selected through Computer Based Test (CBT), Personal Interview, and Skill/Proficiency Test as per the post. The recruitment offers attractive pay scales ranging from ‚Çπ50,000 to ‚Çπ2,20,000 plus allowances, making it a great opportunity for engineering and non-engineering graduates to build a career with Oil India Limited.

item.title: RRC SR Apprentices Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Cell, Southern Railway (RRC SR) has released the official notification for Apprentice Recruitment 2025, offering a total of 3518 apprenticeship slots across various workshops and divisions including Perambur, Golden Rock, Podanur, Chennai, Salem, Madurai, Palakkad, and Trivandrum. Eligible candidates who have passed 10th (50% marks), 12th with Science (for MLT trades), or ITI in relevant trades can apply online from 25 August 2025 to 25 September 2025. The selection will be based on a merit list prepared from academic and ITI marks. Apprentices will receive a stipend of ‚Çπ6,000‚Äì‚Çπ7,000 per month during training. This engagement is purely for apprenticeship training under the Apprentices Act, 1961, and does not guarantee direct employment, though preference will be given in future railway recruitments to candidates who complete the training successfully.

item.title: MP Keerti Card: Special Benefits and Recognition for Daughters
Federal Bank Associate Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Federal Bank has invited applications for the post of Associate Officer (Sales) under its 2025 recruitment drive. The online application window is open from 25/08/2025 to 03/09/2025. Candidates must be graduates with at least 50% aggregate marks in Class X, Class XII/Diploma, and Graduation, and should also hold a valid two- or four-wheeler driving license. The upper age limit is 27 years (born on or after 01/08/1998), and applicants must be domiciled in Gujarat, Telangana, West Bengal, or Delhi NCR. An application fee of ‚Çπ350 (non-refundable) is payable online. The selection process consists of a center-based online aptitude test followed by a personal interview, with selected candidates placed on a one-year probation. The role offers a salary package between ‚Çπ4.59 and ‚Çπ6.19 LPA, along with additional benefits such as medical coverage, NPS, and career progression opportunities.

item.title: DSSSB Chauffeur & Process Server Vacancy 2025
item.description: DSSSB Recruitment 2025 (Advt. No. 04/2025) has been announced for 20 Group C posts of Chauffeur and Despatch Rider-cum-Process Server in Delhi High Court. Eligible 10th pass candidates with a valid driving license and 2 years‚Äô experience can apply online from 26th August to 24th September 2025 at dsssbonline.nic.in.

item.title: DSSSB Delhi High Court Various Post Vacancy 2025
item.description: DSSSB has announced 334 vacancies under Advt No. 03/2025 for various posts in the Delhi High Court, including Security Attendant, Court Attendant, and Room Attendant. The online application process will run from 26 August to 24 September 2025. Candidates with 10th pass or ITI qualification are eligible to apply. The recruitment offers a Level-3 pay scale (‚Çπ21,700‚Äì‚Çπ69,100), with an application fee of ‚Çπ100 for General/OBC/EWS and exemptions for SC/ST/PwBD/Women/Ex-servicemen. Selection will be through a computer-based test and subsequent stages as per the post.

item.title: UPSC Prosecutor & Lecturer Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Union Public Service Commission (UPSC) has announced 84 vacancies through Advertisement No. 12/2025. The recruitment includes Assistant Public Prosecutor (19 posts) and Public Prosecutor (25 posts) in CBI as well as 40 Lecturer posts in Botany, Chemistry, Economics, History, Home Science, Physics, Psychology, Sociology, and Zoology under the School Education Department of UT Ladakh. Eligible candidates can apply online between 23/08/2025 to 11/09/2025. The selection will be based on interview or recruitment test followed by interview. This recruitment offers an excellent opportunity for Law Graduates and Postgraduates with B.Ed. to secure government jobs in prestigious departments.

item.title: SSC Stenographer Grade C & D Answer Key 2025
Patna High Court Stenographer Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Patna High Court has invited applications for 111 Stenographer posts through its Recruitment 2025 notification. The vacancies include 68 regular and 43 backlog posts. Candidates who have passed Intermediate (12th) with English Shorthand (80 WPM), English Typing (40 WPM) and a 6-month Computer Course are eligible to apply. The online application process will be open from 21st August 2025 to 19th September 2025 on the official website. The selection process will consist of a Written Test, Skill Test, and Interview. Selected candidates will receive a salary in Level-4 (‚Çπ25,500 ‚Äì ‚Çπ81,100) with allowances.

item.title: IOB Indian Overseas Bank Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Indian Overseas Bank has announced the Apprentice Recruitment 2025 for 750 vacancies across various states and UTs. Applications will be accepted online from 10 August to 20 August 2025 through the BFSI SSC portal, with the online exam tentatively scheduled for 24 August 2025. Graduates aged 20‚Äì28 years are eligible, with relaxations as per government norms. Selection will be based on an online test, local language proficiency, and document verification. Stipend ranges from ‚Çπ10,000 to ‚Çπ15,000 depending on posting location.

item.title: Indian Navy Civilian INCET Vacancy 2025 Admit Card Download
item.description: The Indian Navy has released the INCET 01/2025 notification for the recruitment of 1097 civilian posts under Group B and Group C categories across various naval commands. Eligible candidates can apply online through the official website for posts like Chargeman, Tradesman Mate, Fireman, Pharmacist, Storekeeper, MTS, and more. The selection process includes a written exam and document verification. Applicants must check post-wise qualifications, age limits, and category-wise vacancies before applying.

item.title: RPSC OTR Registration 2025
item.description: RPSC OTR (One Time Registration) is a permanent registration system started by the Rajasthan Public Service Commission, where candidates need to register only once using their SSO ID. After completing the OTR, applicants can easily apply for any RPSC recruitment without filling in their details repeatedly. This process saves time and ensures accuracy in applications, while also allowing candidates to update their profile whenever required.

item.title: AFCAT 2 2025 Admit Card ‚Äì Indian Air Force
item.description: Indian Air Force has released the AFCAT 02/2025 notification for the recruitment of Commissioned Officers in Flying and Ground Duty (Technical and Non-Technical) branches. Eligible candidates with a graduate or engineering degree can apply online through the official website. The application process is expected to start in June 2025, with the last date likely in July 2025. The selection will be based on a written exam, AFSB interview, and medical test. Candidates must pay ‚Çπ250 as the application fee. For complete details, visit afcat.cdac.in.

item.title: RPSC Senior Teacher Grade IV Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) has released the notification for Senior Teacher Recruitment 2025 under the Secondary Education Department. A total of 6500 vacancies are available in 10 subjects including Hindi, English, Maths, Science, Sanskrit, and more. Eligible candidates can apply online from 19 August to 17 September 2025. Candidates from all states can apply, but reservation and age relaxation are applicable only for Rajasthan domicile candidates.

item.title: MP D.El.Ed Counselling 2025-26 | 5rd Round -Registration
BPSC One-Time Registration Guide 2025
item.description: BPSC (Bihar Public Service Commission) requires a one-time registration. Once registered, you can use the same login ID and password to apply for all BPSC exams. This guide provides a step-by-step registration process, required documents, eligibility criteria, and the latest exam updates to help you apply online easily.

item.title: DSSSB OTR One-Time Registration 2025
item.description: DSSSB One-Time Registration (OARS) allows candidates to create a unique login to apply for multiple posts under the Delhi Subordinate Services Selection Board. The registration process requires personal, academic, and ID details, along with uploading photograph and signature. Once registered, candidates can easily apply for DSSSB vacancies online, check application status, and retrieve login credentials if needed.

item.title: DSSSB Delhi Various Post Vacancy 2025
item.description: Delhi Subordinate Services Selection Board (DSSSB) has announced 615 vacancies through Advertisement No. 02/2025 for various Non-Teaching posts across multiple departments under the Government of NCT of Delhi. The recruitment includes Group B and C positions such as Statistical Clerk, Junior Engineer, Mason, Forest Guard, TGT (Special Education), Music Teacher, Naib Tehsildar, and others. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online from 18 August 2025 to 16 September 2025 via the official website. The notification provides detailed information on post-wise eligibility, pay level, age limit, and selection criteria.

item.title: WBSSC Assistant Teacher Admit Card 2025 ‚Äì Download Hall Ticket
item.description: The West Bengal Central School Service Commission (WBSSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of 35,726 Assistant Teachers for classes 9 to 12 in government schools. Eligible candidates with a minimum of 50% marks in Graduation/Post Graduation and a B.Ed or equivalent degree can apply online within the specified dates.

item.title: Bihar Enforcement Sub Inspector Exam Notice 2025 ‚Äì Download PDF & Full Details
item.description: Bihar Police Subordinate Services Commission (BPSSC)

item.title: Super 100 Examination Form 2025 - Result
item.description: Super 100 Examination 2025 is a scholarship-based initiative by the Government of Madhya Pradesh to provide free coaching for NEET, JEE, and other competitive exams to talented students studying in government schools. Students currently in Class 10 (academic session 2024‚Äì25) can apply online. Selection will be based on a state-level entrance exam. The scheme also includes free hostel facilities, study materials, and expert mentorship for selected candidates.

item.title: BTSC Bihar Nursing Tutor Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Bihar Technical Service Commission (BTSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of 498 Nursing Tutors under the Health Department, Government of Bihar. Candidates holding M.Sc Nursing, B.Sc Nursing (Basic/Post Basic), or a Diploma in Nursing Education & Administration (DNEA) are eligible to apply. The selection process includes eligibility verification and document scrutiny as per INC and Bihar Nursing Council norms. 35% of the vacancies are reserved for female candidates. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official BTSC website within the given time frame.

item.title: RRC Central Railway Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: RRC Central Railway is inviting online applications for 2,418 Apprentice posts under various trades in Mumbai, Bhusawal, Pune, Nagpur, and Solapur divisions. Eligible candidates must have passed 10th with at least 50% marks and possess an ITI certificate in the relevant trade. The application window is open from 12 August to 11 September 2025. Selection will be based on merit from Class 10 and ITI marks. A stipend of ‚Çπ7,000 per month will be provided during the 1-year training. Apply only through the official website rrccr.com.

item.title: RPSC School Lecturer Vacancy 2025 Apply Online
item.description: The Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) has released a recruitment notification for 3225 vacancies for the post of School Lecturer (Grade-I) in various subjects including Hindi, English, Political Science, Geography, History, Physics, Chemistry, Commerce, Drawing, Physical Education, Music, and Sports Coaching categories like Athletics, Basketball, etc. Candidates must possess a Postgraduate degree in the relevant subject along with B.Ed. or an equivalent teaching qualification. The application process will be conducted online through the official RPSC portal from 14 August 2025 to 12 September 2025. Applicants from all Indian states are eligible to apply; however, only Rajasthan state candidates will receive category-based reservation and fee relaxation. Candidates from other states will be considered under the General category.

item.title: RRC Eastern Railway Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Cell (RRC), Eastern Railway, Kolkata has released the official notification for Apprentice Recruitment 2025 for a total of 3115 trade-wise vacancies. The recruitment is open for various divisions and workshops including Howrah, Sealdah, Asansol, Malda, Liluah, Jamalpur, and Kanchrapara. Candidates who have passed Class 10th and possess an ITI certificate in the relevant trade are eligible to apply. The age of the applicant should be between 15 and 24 years. The selection will be based purely on merit, considering the marks obtained in 10th and ITI ‚Äì no written exam will be conducted. Applications must be submitted online through the official RRC ER website within the prescribed dates.

item.title: HP JBT Teacher Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Himachal Pradesh Rajya Chayan Aayog (HPRCA) has announced the HP JBT Teacher Recruitment 2025 for Junior Basic Teacher (Job Trainee) posts under the Elementary Education Department. The online application process will start on 14 August 2025 and close on 17 September 2025. Eligible candidates with the required educational qualifications and TET certificate can apply through the official website.

item.title: UPPSC GIC Lecturer Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission (UPPSC) has announced the UPPSC GIC Lecturer Recruitment 2025 for a total of 1,518 vacancies in various Government Inter Colleges across the state. The vacancies include 777 posts in the Male Branch, 694 posts in the Female Branch, 45 posts in Sparsh Government Inter College for Special Education, and 2 posts in the Uttar Pradesh Jail Training School (Teaching Staff). Candidates must possess a Post Graduate degree in the relevant subject along with a B.Ed. from an NCTE-recognized institution, with additional qualifications required for special and jail training school posts. The online application process will run from 12 August 2025 to 12 September 2025, and selection will be conducted through a Preliminary Examination, Main Written Examination, and Document Verification.

item.title: Indian Navy Skilled Tradesman & Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Indian Navy is inviting applications for 1266 Tradesman Skilled Apprentice posts under the 2025 recruitment drive, including backlog vacancies. The online application process will run from 13 August 2025 to 02 September 2025. Both male and female candidates who meet the eligibility criteria can apply through the official website.

item.title: HPSC Assistant District Attorney ADA Vacancy 2025
item.description: HPSC has announced 255 Assistant District Attorney (ADA) vacancies under Advt. No. 18/2025. The online application process will run from 13 August to 2 September 2025 through the official website hpsc.gov.in. Candidates must hold an LLB degree and meet the age criteria of 21‚Äì42 years. The selection process includes a screening test and a subject knowledge test. The post carries a pay scale of FPL-9 (‚Çπ53,100‚Äì‚Çπ1,67,800).

item.title: HPSC AE, Municipal Engineer & Sub Divisional Engineer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Haryana Public Service Commission (HPSC) has announced 153 Civil Engineer vacancies in various departments including Public Works (B&R), Municipal Corporation, and Panchayati Raj. The posts include Assistant Engineer, Municipal Engineer, and Sub Divisional Engineer for candidates holding a B.E./B.Tech in Civil Engineering (AICTE approved). The online application process will start from 12 August 2025 and will remain open until 1 September 2025, 5:00 PM. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official HPSC website.

item.title: IOCL Southern Region SR Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: IOCL Southern Region has announced 475 Apprentice vacancies for Trade, Technician, and Graduate disciplines across Tamil Nadu & Puducherry, Karnataka, Kerala, Andhra Pradesh, and Telangana. The application process will be open from 08 August 2025 to 05 September 2025 through the NAPS/NATS portal. Candidates will be selected based on merit, with no written exam or interview.
