item.title: Daily Sarkari Yojna News on WhatsApp ‚Äì Join Yojna Portal Today
item.description: Join the official Yojna Portal WhatsApp Channel to receive daily updates on government schemes, job alerts, subsidies, and welfare programs ‚Äî all in one place, direct to your phone.

item.title: Bank of Baroda Sales Manager & Agriculture Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bank of Baroda has announced its Recruitment Drive 2025 for a total of 417 vacancies across two departments‚ÄîRetail Liabilities and Rural & Agri Banking. The available posts include Manager ‚Äì Sales, Officer ‚Äì Agriculture Sales, and Manager ‚Äì Agriculture Sales. The online application process begins on 6th August 2025 and closes on 26th August 2025. Candidates must hold relevant educational qualifications such as a graduation degree (with preference for MBA/PGDM in Sales/Marketing) or a 4-year degree in Agriculture-related fields. Prior work experience in sales or agri-sales (preferably in the BFSI sector) is mandatory. The selection process may include an online test, psychometric assessment, group discussion, and/or interview. Selected candidates will be posted anywhere in India and must commit to a 3-year service bond. Interested applicants are advised to visit the official Bank of Baroda website to read the full notification and apply online.

item.title: MP Bhulekh (WebGis 2.0) 2025 - Khasra, B1, Naksha Download
item.description: MP Bhulekh (WebGis 2.0) 2025 is an official online portal developed by the Revenue Department of the Government of Madhya Pradesh. It allows citizens to access digital land records such as Khasra, B1, and Land Maps (Naksha) in PDF format. Through this platform, users can search by district, tehsil, village, or landowner name, and download digitally signed documents. The portal also provides an option to apply online for a Digital Land Ownership Certificate, ensuring transparency and easy access to verified land details. Services are available in both Hindi and English, making it citizen-friendly and accessible to all.

item.title: RPSC Veterinary Officer Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) has announced 1100 vacancies for the post of Veterinary Officer under the Animal Husbandry Department. The recruitment is open to candidates holding a Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Veterinary Science and Animal Husbandry or its equivalent from a recognized university in India, along with knowledge of Hindi in Devanagari script and Rajasthani culture. The application process will be conducted online, starting from 5 August 2025 and closing on 3 September 2025. The vacancies are distributed among various categories, including General (360), SC (198), ST (183), OBC (209), MBC (50), and EWS (100), with a total of 1100 posts available

item.title: Haryana HPSC ADO Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Haryana Public Service Commission (HPSC) has released the notification for the recruitment of 785 Agricultural Development Officer (ADO) posts under the Administrative Cadre (Group-B) in the Agriculture and Farmers Welfare Department, Haryana. Candidates possessing a B.Sc. (Hons) in Agriculture and having studied Hindi or Sanskrit up to Matric or higher are eligible to apply. The online application process will begin on 5th August 2025 and will remain open until 25th August 2025 (up to 5:00 PM). Applicants must be between 18 to 42 years of age as on 01 July 2025. The selected candidates will be placed in Pay Level-6 of the 7th CPC pay matrix, with a salary range of ‚Çπ35,400 to ‚Çπ1,12,400. All 27 PwBD reserved posts are included in the total of 785 vacancies. Interested candidates can apply through the official HPSC website at hpsc.gov.in. Category-wise vacancy breakup, reservation rules, fee details, and application instructions are available in the official notification.

item.title: RRB NTPC 10+2 Under Graduate Level Exam City/ Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has officially released the exam dates for the NTPC 10+2 (Under Graduate) level posts. The Computer Based Test (CBT 1) will be conducted from 7 August to 8 September 2025. Candidates who have applied for the RRB NTPC UG posts can check the detailed exam schedule on the official RRB websites. This exam is conducted for 12th-pass candidates applying for various undergraduate-level posts in Indian Railways.

item.title: SSC Multi Tasking Staff MTS Vacancy 2025- Correction
item.description: Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the notification for Multi-Tasking Staff (MTS) and Havaldar Recruitment 2025. Eligible 10th pass candidates can apply online for these posts. The selection includes CBT and Physical Test (for Havaldar). Check complete details including eligibility, age limit, application dates, and how to apply.

item.title: RRC Western Railway Sports Quota Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Cell (RRC), Western Railway has released a notification for Sports Quota Recruitment 2025-26, inviting online applications from eligible sportspersons across India. A total of 64 vacancies will be filled, which include 5 posts under Level 5/4 (Group C) for graduates, 16 posts under Level 3/2 (Group C) for candidates with 12th pass, ITI, Diploma, or Apprenticeship, and 43 posts under Level 1 (Group D) for candidates who have passed 10th, ITI, NAC, or hold a Diploma. The recruitment is open for various disciplines such as Cricket, Kabaddi, Wrestling, Athletics, Football, Basketball, and more. The selection will be based on sports achievements and trial performance‚Äîno written exam will be conducted. The online application process begins on 30 July 2025 and will close on 29 August 2025 via the official website www.rrc-wr.com.

item.title: Indian Navy SSC Executive (IT) Vacancy Jan 2026
item.description: Commission (SSC) in Information Technology (Executive Branch) for the January 2026 course. A total of 15 vacancies are available. Applicants must hold a degree in BE/B.Tech/M.Tech/MCA/MSc in Computer Science, Information Technology, Artificial Intelligence, Cyber Security, or related fields with a minimum of 60% marks, along with at least 60% marks in English in Class 10 or 12. Eligible candidates should be born between 02 January 2001 and 01 July 2006 (both dates inclusive). The online application window opens on 02 August 2025 and closes on 17 August 2025. The selection process includes shortlisting based on normalized marks, SSB interview, medical examination, and merit list. Selected candidates will be appointed as Sub Lieutenants and undergo training at the Indian Naval Academy (INA), Ezhimala, Kerala. The initial service tenure is 10 years, which may be extended up to 14 years (10+2+2) based on performance and service requirements. The basic pay starts at ‚Çπ56,100/- plus applicable allowances. For more details and to apply online, visit the official website: www.joinindiannavy.gov.in.

item.title: MPESB PBBSc & MSc 2025 Result | Download Now
Bank of Baroda BOB Varios Post Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bank of Baroda has announced the recruitment of 330 contractual officers for various departments including Digital Banking, MSME Sales, and Risk Management. The online application process is open from 30th July to 19th August 2025. The posts include Assistant Manager, Deputy Manager, and AVP roles, requiring relevant educational qualifications and work experience. The selection will be based on shortlisting and personal interviews. Candidates must maintain a minimum CIBIL score of 680 and be willing to work anywhere in India.

item.title: SSC Combined Translator Exam 2025 Online Form
SCI Court Master Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Supreme Court of India has invited online applications for 30 posts of Court Master (Shorthand) in 2025. Eligible candidates must be between 30 to 45 years of age and hold a graduate degree with shorthand speed of 120 w.p.m. and computer typing speed of 40 w.p.m., along with at least 5 years of experience in a relevant government or public sector post. The selection process includes a Shorthand Test, Written Test, Typing Speed Test, and Interview. Candidates with a law degree will receive additional weightage. Applications can be submitted online through the official website of the Supreme Court at www.sci.gov.in.

item.title: Check MP Board 12th Second Exam Result 2025 ‚Äì MPBSE Class XIIth Result Declared
UPPSC OTR One Time Registration 2025
item.description: UPPSC OTR (One Time Registration) is an online registration system launched by the Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission to simplify the application process for various state-level exams. Candidates need to register only once by providing their personal, educational, and ID details. Once registered, they can apply for future UPPSC recruitments without filling in their details again. This system saves time, reduces errors, and ensures accuracy in applications.

item.title: MSME Udyam Registration 2025- Online Form
item.description: Udyam Registration is an official government process under the Ministry of MSME (Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises) in India. It allows small business owners, startups, manufacturers, and service providers to register their businesses and get recognized as an MSME. The registration is completely free, online, and requires only basic documents like Aadhaar and PAN. Once registered, businesses get access to government benefits such as subsidies, low-interest loans, tax exemptions, and priority in tenders. It is mandatory for businesses that want to avail of MSME schemes and participate in government opportunities.

item.title: RPSC Assistant Agriculture Engineer AAE Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) has released the notification for the recruitment of Assistant Agriculture Engineer (AAE) 2025 with a total of 281 vacancies. Candidates must hold a Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Agricultural Engineering from a recognized university to be eligible. Additionally, applicants should have a working knowledge of Hindi written in Devanagari script and a good understanding of Rajasthan‚Äôs culture. The online application process will be open from 28 July 2025 to 26 August 2025. Vacancies are distributed across various categories including General, OBC, SC, ST, EWS, and MBC. Candidates are advised to check the detailed notification and ensure they meet the eligibility criteria before applying

item.title: MP Board Retotaling / AnswerBook Request Apply Form 2025
UPSC Assistant Director (Systems) Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Union Public Service Commission (UPSC) has released Advertisement No. 10/2025 inviting online applications for the post of Assistant Director (Systems) in the Directorate of Income Tax (Systems), Department of Revenue, Ministry of Finance. A total of 45 vacancies are available under various categories including UR, EWS, OBC, SC, ST, and PwBD. The position is classified as Group ‚ÄòA‚Äô Gazetted, Non-Ministerial and offers a Level-10 pay scale under the 7th CPC. Candidates with qualifications such as BE/B.Tech, M.Tech, MCA, or equivalent in Computer Science/Applications along with relevant experience in electronic data processing are eligible to apply. The role involves software development, debugging, maintenance, and supervision of technical staff. The headquarters is in New Delhi, but the selected candidates can be posted anywhere in India. The last date to apply online is 14 August 2025, and applications must be submitted through the official website https://upsconline.gov.in/ora/.

item.title: NSP One Time Registration (OTR) 2025
item.description: NSP OTR (One Time Registration) is a new mandatory process introduced on the National Scholarship Portal (NSP) from the academic year 2025 onwards. All students must create an OTR ID using their Aadhaar-linked mobile number before applying for any scholarship. This ensures a unique and secure identity for every applicant, prevents duplication, and streamlines the scholarship process.

item.title: MPESB PNST & GNMTST 2025 | Result Download

item.title: APAAR ID / ABC ID card Online Apply & Download
item.description: The Apaar ID (also called ABC ID) is a unique 12-digit identification number issued by the Ministry of Education, Government of India under the National Education Policy (NEP) 2020. It is designed for school and college students across India to digitally store their academic records, credits, and certificates. The card facilitates seamless credit transfer and academic mobility through platforms like DigiLocker and the Academic Bank of Credits (ABC Portal). Students can apply online using their Aadhaar and basic educational details. The card is available to all students from Class 1 onward and can be downloaded from DigiLocker or the ABC portal after registration.

item.title: BSF Constable Sports Quota Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Border Security Force (BSF) has released the official notification for the recruitment of Constable (General Duty) under Sports Quota 2025. A total of 241 vacancies are available for meritorious male and female sportspersons who have participated at national or international levels. Candidates must have passed Class 10th (Matric) from a recognized board and must possess valid sports certificates. The application process is completely online and starts from 25 July 2025. Eligible candidates can apply before the last date, 20 August 2025. This is a golden opportunity for young sportspersons to serve in BSF with pride.

item.title: NTA CSIR NET June 2025 Admitcard Available
item.description: The National Testing Agency (NTA) has released the CSIR UGC NET June 2025 notification for Junior Research Fellowship (JRF) and Lectureship/Assistant Professor in various science subjects. Eligible candidates can apply online at csirnet.nta.nic.in. Check important dates, eligibility, syllabus, and exam pattern before applying.

item.title: BPSC Bihar Assistant Engineer 2025 Answerkey Download
item.description: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has released the Admit Card for the Assistant Engineer (AE) Recruitment 2025 under Advertisement Nos. 29/2025, 30/2025, and 31/2025. The exam is scheduled to be held from 17th to 19th July 2025, and candidates can download their admit cards from 14th July 2025 by visiting the official website bpsc.bihar.gov.in. The admit card is a mandatory document to appear in the exam, and it contains key details like exam date, time, venue, and instructions.

item.title: Join Indian Army SSC Tech Men (66) April 2026
item.description: The Indian Army has invited applications for the 66th Short Service Commission (Technical) Men Entry for the course commencing in April 2026. A total of 350 vacancies are available for unmarried male engineering graduates in various disciplines including Civil, Mechanical, Electrical, Computer Science, and others. Candidates must be between 20 to 27 years of age as on 01 April 2026. Final year students who will complete their degree before April 2026 are also eligible to apply. The selection process includes shortlisting of applications, SSB interview, medical examination, and merit list preparation. Selected candidates will undergo 49 weeks of training at the Officers Training Academy (OTA), Chennai, and will be commissioned as Lieutenants. During training, cadets will receive a stipend of ‚Çπ56,100 per month. The online application process will be open from 24 July 2025 to 22 August 2025 on the official website www.joinindianarmy.nic.in.

item.title: Indian Army SSCW Tech Recruitment 2025
item.description: ndian Army has announced SSCW (Tech) 66 Women Recruitment 2025, offering 31 vacancies for women candidates including engineering graduates and widows of Defence Personnel. Eligible unmarried women and widows can apply online from 23 July 2025 to 21 August 2025. The course will begin in April 2026 at Officers Training Academy (OTA), and selected candidates will undergo 49 weeks of training before commissioning as Lieutenants.

item.title: BTSC Staff Nurse Amitcard Available
item.description: The Bihar Technical Service Commission (BTSC) has officially announced the Staff Nurse Computer-Based Test (CBT) schedule under Advt. No. 23/2025. The exam will be conducted on 30 July, 31 July, 1 August, and 3 August 2025 across multiple shifts. Candidates who have applied for over 11,000 Staff Nurse posts should prepare accordingly. The admit card will be released soon on the official website btsc.bihar.gov.in.

item.title: RSSB Platoon Commander Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB) has invited online applications for the post of Platoon Commander under the Rajasthan Home Guard Department. A total of 84 vacancies are available for this Group B, non-gazetted government job. Candidates must possess a graduation degree, along with knowledge of Hindi written in Devanagari script and familiarity with Rajasthan’s culture. Only those who have appeared in the CET (Graduation Level) 2024 exam are eligible to apply. Selected candidates will be placed under a 2-year probation period with fixed monthly remuneration. The pay scale is as per Pay Matrix Level-10 (‚Çπ9300‚Äì34800 + Grade Pay ‚Çπ3600). Applications are accepted online only through the official RSSB portal.

item.title: Bank of Baroda Various Posts Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bank of Baroda has released the official notification for the recruitment of 41 Specialist Officer posts on a regular basis across various departments including Digital Banking, Information Technology, Information Security, and Fire & Safety. The available positions include Manager, Senior Manager, Chief Manager, and Fire Safety Officer. Candidates must possess qualifications such as BE/B.Tech, MCA, or M.Sc in relevant disciplines, along with specific certifications like CEH, CISSP, or CISA for select roles. The application process is completely online and starts from 23 July 2025, with the last date being 12 August 2025. The selection may include an online test followed by a group discussion or personal interview. The jobs are regular and full-time, with postings across India. Interested candidates can apply through the official website www.bankofbaroda.in. Category-wise vacancy details (UR/SC/ST/OBC/EWS) have not been disclosed in the notification.

The process is fully online, and applicants need to provide basic personal information, educational documents, and Aadhaar details to complete their profile.

item.title: MPESB Animal Husbandry ADDET 2025 Result Declared
item.description: Madhya Pradesh Employees Selection Board (MPESB) has released the ADDET 2025 Result for the Animal Husbandry and Dairy Technology Diploma Entrance Test. Candidates who appeared in the exam can now check their scores, download the result PDF, and view the merit list and cutoff details on the official MPESB website.

item.title: Territorial Army Officer Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Territorial Army has released the Officer Admit Card 2025 on its official website. Registered candidates can download their admit card using their login credentials. The written examination will be conducted as per the scheduled date mentioned on the admit card. It is mandatory to carry the admit card and a valid photo ID to the exam center.

item.title: Aadhaar Operator / Supervisor Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Aadhaar Operator/Supervisor recruitment 2025 has been announced for various states across India. item.title: HRRL Various Posts Vacancy 2025
item.description: Hindustan Petroleum Rajasthan Refinery Limited (HRRL) has released a recruitment notification for 131 vacancies across various departments including Engineering (Chemical, Mechanical, Electrical, Civil, Instrumentation), HR, Finance, Legal, Fire & Safety, and Medical.

item.title: Indian Army SSC Tech Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Indian Army has released the short notification for SSC Technical Entry 66th Course for Men and Women. A total of 379 vacancies are available, including 350 for men and 29 for women. The course will commence in April 2026 at Officers Training Academy (OTA), Chennai. Candidates with a Degree in Engineering (B.E. / B.Tech) in relevant disciplines are eligible to apply. The online application process will begin on 16 July 2025 and continue until 14 August 2025 through the official website joinindianarmy.nic.in. This is a great opportunity for aspiring engineers to join the Indian Army as Short Service Commission Officers.

item.title: Damoh District Data Entry Operator Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Collector Office, Damoh (Madhya Pradesh) has released a notification for the recruitment of Office Assistant cum Data Entry Operator (Contractual). There is 1 vacancy, reserved for the Scheduled Caste (SC) category. Candidates must have passed 12th class, hold a valid CPCT score card, and possess typing proficiency in both Hindi and English. A minimum of 3 years of experience in MS Office and database software is required, along with skills in data feeding and document scanning. The applicant must be a domicile of Madhya Pradesh. The application process starts from 15 July 2025 and the last date to apply online via the MPOnline portal is 31 July 2025.

item.title: Chandigarh High Court Reader (Legal) Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Punjab and Haryana High Court, Chandigarh has invited online applications for 60 posts of Reader (Legal). Eligible candidates must have 10+2 with 60% marks in English, an LL.B. degree, and computer proficiency. The selection process includes a written exam, computer proficiency test, and viva-voce. The application process is open from 14 July 2025 to 04 August 2025. Candidates are advised to check the official notification for detailed eligibility, syllabus, and instructions.

item.title: Chandigarh High Court Peon Vacancy 2025
item.description: Chandigarh High Court has invited online applications for 75 posts of Peon (Residential). Eligible candidates with 10th pass qualification, 1-year diploma in cooking/culinary arts, and 3 years of cooking experience can apply from 14 July to 4 August 2025 at www.highcourtchd.gov.in. Applicants from all states are eligible, but reservation and fee relaxation are available only for residents of Punjab, Haryana, and Chandigarh. Selection will be based on a practical test (80 marks) and interview (20 marks). Application fee is ‚Çπ700 for general and ‚Çπ600 for reserved categories.

The recruitment is open for both Fresher and Ex-ITI candidates. Applicants must have passed Class 10th or 12th, and ITI is required for certain trades. The selection will be based on merit, without any written exam.

item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has officially announced the exam date for the Computer-Based Aptitude Test (CBAT) under the Assistant Loco Pilot (ALP) recruitment, CEN 01/2024. The CBAT exam is scheduled to be held on 15th July 2025. Candidates who qualified in CBT-2 are eligible to appear for this final stage. The City Intimation Slip is expected to be released from 5th July 2025, and the admit cards will likely be available from 11th July 2025. Aadhaar-based biometric verification will be mandatory on the exam day. For more details, candidates are advised to visit the official RRB website at rrbcdg.gov.in.

item.title: UPSC CPF Assistant Commandant Final Result 2025
item.description: The Union Public Service Commission (UPSC) has released the Final Result for the Central Armed Police Forces (Assistant Commandants) Examination 2025. Candidates who appeared in the recruitment process can now download the Final Selection List (Merit List PDF) from the official website.

item.title: Rajasthan High Court Class IV (Peon) Vacancy 2025 - Online Form
MP RTE Admssion 2025-26 Dwonload 2nd Round Allotement Letter
WCDC Bihar Various Post 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Women and Child Development Corporation (WCDC), Bihar has released the WCDC Bihar Various Post Recruitment 2025 notification for a total of 77 contractual vacancies. These include posts like Central Administrator, Case Worker, Para Legal Personnel / Lawyer, Para Medical Personnel, Psycho-Social Counsellor, and Office Assistant (with computer knowledge). Except for the Office Assistant post, all other posts are reserved exclusively for female candidates. Only women who are residents of Bihar are eligible to apply (male/female both can apply for Office Assistant). The application process is completely online and will remain open from 26 June 2025 to 18 July 2025 (up to 6:00 PM). Interested candidates can visit the official website wdc.bihar.gov.in for eligibility, category-wise vacancy details, and to submit their application.

item.title: SSC GD Constable Recruitment 2024, Download Result/Answerkey
item.description: Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has relased General Duty GD Constable Notification 2024. Those candidates who are interested in this SSC GD Constable CAPFs, NIA, SSF and Rifleman (GD) in Assam Rifles Examination,2025 can apply online from Dates 05/09/2024 to 14/10/2024. Read the SSC GD Constable 2024 SSC GD Constable 2024 Exam City Details

item.title: UPCATET Result 2025
item.description: The UPCATET Result 2025 has been officially released on June 24, 2025, by Chandra Shekhar Azad University of Agriculture & Technology. Candidates who appeared for the UG, PG, and PhD entrance exams can now check and download their scorecard and rank card from the official website upcatet.net using their registration credentials. The result includes subject-wise marks, group rank, and category rank. The counselling process will begin soon for qualified candidates.

item.title: UPSSSC Junior Assistant Mains Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Subordinate Services Selection Commission (UPSSSC) has released the Mains Admit Card for the Junior Assistant Recruitment 2025. Candidates who qualified for the preliminary exam can now download their admit card from the official website, upsssc.gov.in. The admit card contains important details like exam date, reporting time, exam center, and instructions. It is mandatory to carry a printed copy of the admit card along with a valid ID proof on the exam day.

item.title: MP CM Seed & Fertilizer Subsidy Scheme 2025 ‚Äì Full Details
Rajasthan Cooperative Bank Result 2025
item.description: The Rajasthan Cooperative Recruitment Board (RCRB) has declared the result for various posts including Clerk, Junior Assistant, Salesman, Manager, and others. Candidates who appeared in the examination can now check their results, merit list, and cutoff marks through the official website. The selection is based on written exam performance and document verification. Candidates are advised to download the result PDF and keep a copy for future reference.

item.title: Bihar BTSC GMO Result 2025
item.description: The Bihar Technical Service Commission (BTSC) has officially released the GMO (General Medical Officer) Result 2025. Candidates who appeared for the examination can now check their results, merit list, and cut-off marks on the official BTSC website. The result PDF is available for download, and shortlisted candidates will be called for further procedures as per the official notice.

item.title: UG PG B.Ed. College Admission 2025 |Apply Online | 2st Round | Allotment Letter

item.description: The Bihar State Power Holding Company Limited (BSPHCL) has released the admit card for the Junior Customer Assistant (JCA) Recruitment Exam 2025. Candidates can download their hall ticket from the official website. The admit card includes important details such as exam date, time, venue, and instructions. Carrying the admit card along with a valid photo ID is mandatory to appear in the examination.

item.title: JPSC Project Manager 2025 Online Form
item.description: JPSC Project Manager Online Form 2025 invites applications from eligible candidates for 30 posts under Jharkhand Public Service Commission. Applicants must have a Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering/Technology or in subjects like Economics, Statistics, Science, Commerce, Cost Accountancy, Sericulture, Food Technology, or Management from a recognized institution. This recruitment is primarily for residents of Jharkhand. The application process is completely online through the official website jpsc.gov.in.

  • Application Begin: 18/03/2025
  • Last Date for Apply Online: 17/04/2025
  • Pay Exam Fee Last Date: 17/04/2025
  • Submit Form Hard Copy: 22/04/2025
  • Exam Date: As per Schedule

  • SC / ST: 0/-
  • All Category Female: 0/-

  • Maximum Age: 30 Years

Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB) | RSMSSB

Short Details of Notification Rajasthan 4th Grade Employee Advt No. : 19/2024

  • Application Begin: 21/03/2025
  • Last Date for Apply Online: 19/04/2025
  • Complete Form Last Date: 19/04/2025
  • Rajasthan Fourth Class Employee Exam Date: 18-21 September 2025
  • Admit Card Available: Before Exam

Application Fee

  • General / OBC: 600/-
  • OBC NCL: 400/-
  • SC / ST: 400/-

Eligibility

  • Age Limit as on 01/01/2026

  • Minimum Age: 18 Years
  • Maximum Age: 40 Years

item.description:
‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ß‡§æ‡§®‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§®‡§∂‡§ø‡§™ ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ (PM Internship Yojna) 2025

üì¢ PM Internship Yojna ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§≤‡§æ‡§≠ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø

üì¢ ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø
  • ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§µ‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§£‡§æ‡§≤‡•Ä (Government Functioning) ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ù ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡§æ‡•§
  • ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∂‡§æ‡§∏‡§®‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡•å‡§∂‡§≤ (Administrative Skills) ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§®‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§£‡§Ø ‡§≤‡•á‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§®‡§æ‡•§

  • ‚úÖ ‡§è‡§ï‡§Æ‡•Å‡§∂‡•ç‡§§ ‡§∏‡§π‡§æ‡§Ø‡§§‡§æ: ‚Çπ6,000 (‡§á‡§Ç‡§ü‡§∞‡•ç‡§®‡§∂‡§ø‡§™ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶)
  • ‚úÖ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§≤: ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§ø‡§®‡•ç‡§® ‡§∏‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ø‡§≠‡§æ‡§ó ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§≤‡§Ø
üì¢ ‡§Æ‡§π‡§§‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ç
  • ‡§™‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§ï‡§∞‡§£ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç: ‡§´‡§∞‡§µ‡§∞‡•Ä 2025
  • ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Æ ‡§§‡§ø‡§•‡§ø: 12 ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ö 2025
  • ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ü‡§∞‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ö‡§Ø‡§®: ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ö 2025 ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§§ ‡§§‡§ï
  • ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç: ‡§Ö‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•à‡§≤ 2025
üì¢ ‡§™‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§æ (Eligibility)
  • ‚úîÔ∏è ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§®‡§æ‡§ó‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•§
  • ‚úîÔ∏è ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•Å ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§Æ‡§æ: 21 ‡§∏‡•á 24 ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑
  • ‚úîÔ∏è ‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Ç‡§®‡§§‡§Æ ‡§∂‡•à‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ó‡•ç‡§Ø‡§§‡§æ: SSC (10‡§µ‡•Ä‡§Ç) ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§ï‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑
  • ‚úîÔ∏è ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§ø‡§§ ‡§®‡•å‡§ï‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§∞‡§§ ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•ã‡§®‡§æ ‡§ö‡§æ‡§π‡§ø‡§è‡•§
  • ‚úîÔ∏è ‡§ë‡§®‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§°‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•á‡§Ç‡§∏ ‡§≤‡§∞‡•ç‡§®‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§™‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§à ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§µ‡§æ‡§≤‡•á ‡§õ‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§™‡§æ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§
üì¢ ‡§Ü‡§µ‡•á‡§¶‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ
  • üëâ ‡§Ü‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç‡•§

item.title: How to Self-Link DBT with NPCI? ‚Äì Easy Online & Offline Methods
item.description:
NPCI ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§Ø‡§Ç DBT ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç? ‚Äì ‡§ë‡§®‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ë‡§´‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§Ü‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡§æ

How to Self-Link DBT with NPCI? ‚Äì Easy Online & Offline Methods

üì¢ NPCI ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§π‡•à ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•á‡•§
  • NPCI (‡§®‡•á‡§∂‡§®‡§≤ ‡§™‡•á‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•â‡§∞‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡•á‡§∂‡§® ‡§ë‡§´ ‡§á‡§Ç‡§°‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ) ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§°‡§æ‡§Ø‡§∞‡•á‡§ï‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡•á‡§®‡§ø‡§´‡§ø‡§ü ‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏‡§´‡§∞ (DBT) ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§≠ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§™‡•ç‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡•à‡§Ç‡§ï ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§§‡•á ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§Ç‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§π‡•à‡•§ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ë‡§®‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ë‡§´‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§§‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§æ ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§
üì¢ ‡§ë‡§®‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ: ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ü‡§∞‡§®‡•á‡§ü ‡§¨‡•à‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§∏‡•á:
  • NPCI ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ë‡§´‡§ø‡§∏‡§ø‡§Ø‡§≤ Website ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§Ø‡•á‡§Ç
  • "Consumer" ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç
  • Bharat Aadhaar Seeding Enabler (BASE) ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡•§
  • Aadhaar Seeding/Deseeding ‡§ü‡•á‡§™ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•ç‡§≤‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á
  • ‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ñ‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§¨‡§ß‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§≠‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§¨‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ü ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§
  • (‡§Ö‡§•‡§µ‡§æ)
  • ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•á ‡§¨‡•à‡§Ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§á‡§Ç‡§ü‡§∞‡§®‡•á‡§ü ‡§¨‡•à‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≤‡•â‡§ó‡§ø‡§® ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§
  • '‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§°‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó' ‡§Ø‡§æ '‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó' ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§≤‡•ç‡§™ ‡§ö‡•Å‡§®‡•á‡§Ç‡•§
  • ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§ß‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§Ç‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï ‡§µ‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§≠‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§
  • ‡§∏‡§¨‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ü ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§¶, ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡§Ç‡§ú‡•Ä‡§ï‡•É‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•ã‡§¨‡§æ‡§á‡§≤ ‡§®‡§Ç‡§¨‡§∞ ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ì‡§ü‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ä (OTP) ‡§Ü‡§è‡§ó‡§æ‡•§
  • ‡§ì‡§ü‡•Ä‡§™‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§ú ‡§ï‡§∞‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§

  • Application Begin: 19/02/2025
  • Last Date for Apply Online: 05/03/2025
  • Complete Form Last Date: 05/03/2025
  • Exam Date: As per Schedule
  • Admit Card Available: Before Exam

Application Fee

  • General / OBC / EWS : 800/-
  • SC / ST : 600/-
  • PH (Divyang) : 400/-
  • All Category Female : 600/-
  • Pay the Exam Fees Through Debit Card / Credit Card / Net Banking Only.

Eligibility

  • Age Limit as on 01/02/2025

  • Minimum Age: 20 Years.
  • Maximum Age: 28 Years.

Age relaxation as per rules of UBI Apprentices Exam 2025.

Important Dates

  • Application Begin : 01/01/2025
  • Last Date : 31/01/2025
  • Pay Exam Fee Last Date : 31/01/2025

  • Admit Card Available : Before Exam

Application Fee

  • SC / ST / PH / Female : 0/-
  • Pay the Exam Fee , Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking, UPI Mode Only.

  • Minimum Age : 18 Years
  • Maximum Age : 30 Years for Superintendent
  • Maximum Age : 27 Years for Junior Assistant
